text: Alfred Majerowicz (July 31, 1925 in Poznań – November 2, 2018) was a Polish geologist who was a lecturer at the University of Wrocław."Prof. zw. dr hab. Alfred Majerowicz", an obituary, Gazeta Wyborcza, November 7, 2018 He was a founder of the Polish Mineralogical Society, and in 1996 he became its honorary member. In 1971–1972 he was a deputy director, in 1972–1975 he was the director of the Institute of Geological Sciences of the University of Wrocław.New Honorary Members of The Mineralogical Society of Poland. Alfred Majerowicz , Mineralogia Polonica, Vol. 28, No. 2 His main scientific activity was petrology of crystalline rocks in Lower Silesia. ==Awards and decorations== * *Gold Cross of Merit *Knight's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta *:pl:Medal Komisji Edukacji Narodowej *Gold :pl:Medal Uniwersytetu Wrocławskiego"ZMARŁ PROF.
